title: mega breaches
extract: Mega breaches are  data breach incidents that cause the exposure of at least 10 million identities. But when you examine the numbers, mega breaches often means 10s of millions of identities.
extract_html: Mega breaches are data breach incidents that cause the exposure of at least 10 million identities. But when you examine the numbers, mega breaches often means 10s of millions of identities.
